description: Single storey rear extension with an overall depth of 6m, a maximum height of 3.95m, and an eaves height of 2.49m. (PRIOR APPROVAL)
decision_conditions: The Council consider that the impact of the proposed development on the amenity of the neighbouring dwelling at no. 17 Elmer Gardens would be unacceptable by reason of its depth, height and proximity to the shared boundary with this neighbour and would therefore result in a loss of daylight to this neighbour and also have an overbearing impact and increased sense of enclosure on these neighbouring occupants, all of which would be detrimental to their amenity.

The applicant should note that this consent is solely for the details outlined on the application form for a single storey rear extension with an overall depth of 6m, a maximum height of 3.95m, and an eaves height of 2.49m. (PRIOR APPROVAL).

The eaves height needs to be in accordance with MHCLG Permitted development rights for householders Technical Guidance dated September 2019. The drawings provided with this application does not conform in the way that the eaves height should be measured, and therefore a further Larger Homes Extension Application for a single storey rear extension may be required or a householder planning application.

From the plans provided, it is seems that the eaves height is incorrect as when measured from the ground level at the base of the outside wall to the point where that wall would meet the upper surface of the roof, it measures as 2.67m high.
